fields.customfield_10312:
Resolve the code conflicts and release ULIVZ 37575 and ULIVZ 35806

Fix bug ULIVZ 37700 and ULIVZ 37699
fields.description:
For all future new emails, we will use a standard link builder to build links in emails.

We have code conflicts between ULIVZ 37575 and ULIVZ 35806, which need to be resolved first in order to launch the new link builder. Otherwise, when we develop new emails, there will be code conflicts with the link builder again. 

 

*See details below:*  

The original link builder was outdated and not including UTM, so developers have to hard-code each UTM link for all emails. 

Ticket ULIVZ-37575 refactors the link builder to create standard UTMs for MX and ZA emails. (This is the branch: [https://github.corp.ebay.com/ecg-global/bolt-platform/compare/matt-ULIVZ-36233-VIVAUTM-refactor])

While still having two bugs need to be fixed:

https://jira.xxx.com/browse/ULIVZ-37700

https://jira.xxx.com/browse/ULIVZ-37699

 

 

The UTM refactor ticket has code conflicts with a new seller email ticket [ULIVZ-35806|https://jira.xxx.com/browse/ULIVZ-35806] 

Here are the changes:

[https://github.corp.ebay.com/ecg-global/bolt-platform/commit/c97ecfaf5b81fcce60dccb6738309bff21f140a1#diff-f2c7dd250360915db4726814fe1e30fa]
fields.summary: Improve warning when automatic ctor/dtor are enabled

comments.body: [~spielberg] Just want to check this conflict has already been fixed. I will close the ticket if so. What's the UTM solution at the end? Copy [~spliu]
Code conflict has been fixed by Channing, but we need team resource to fix the two bugs for the next sprint, so that we won't track other BE emails blindly.
Fixed directly in branch matt-ULIVZ-36233-VIVAUTM-refactor. The two defects have been set to "ready for QA". Please close this ticket as well after verifying them.
Followed by story ULIVZ-39034 in S16.

items.fromString: New UTM builder and new seller email conflict
items.toString: New UTM builder and new seller email code conflict

items.fromString:
For all future new emails, we will use a standard link builder to build links in emails.

We have code conflicts between ULIVZ 37575 and ULIVZ 35806 need to be resolved to launch the new link builder. See details below:  

 

The original link builder was outdated and not include UTM, so developers have to hard-code each UTM links for all emails. 

Ticket[ULIVZ-37575|https://jira.xxx.com/browse/ULIVZ-37575]] refactor the link builder to create standardized UTMs for MX and ZA.  This is the branch: [https://github.corp.ebay.com/ecg-global/bolt-platform/compare/matt-ULIVZ-36233-VIVAUTM-refactor]

While still having two bugs need to be fixed:

https://jira.xxx.com/browse/ULIVZ-37700

https://jira.xxx.com/browse/ULIVZ-37699

 

 

However, the UTM refactor ticket has conflicts with a new seller email ticket [ULIVZ-35806|https://jira.xxx.com/browse/ULIVZ-35806]

Here are the changes:

[https://github.corp.ebay.com/ecg-global/bolt-platform/commit/c97ecfaf5b81fcce60dccb6738309bff21f140a1#diff-f2c7dd250360915db4726814fe1e30fa]
items.toString:
For all future new emails, we will use a standard link builder to build links in emails.

We have code conflicts between [ULIVZ 37575|https://jira.xxx.com/browse/ULIVZ-37575] and [ULIVZ 35806|https://jira.xxx.com/browse/ULIVZ-35806], which need to be resolved first in order to launch the new link builder. Otherwise, when we develop new emails, there will be code conflicts with the link builder again. 

 

See details below:  

 

The original link builder was outdated and not include UTM, so developers have to hard-code each UTM links for all emails. 

Ticket [ULIVZ-37575] refactor the link builder to create standardized UTMs for MX and ZA.  This is the branch: [https://github.corp.ebay.com/ecg-global/bolt-platform/compare/matt-ULIVZ-36233-VIVAUTM-refactor]

While still having two bugs need to be fixed:

However, the UTM refactor ticket has conflicts with a new seller email ticket ULIVZ-35806
